      • getForumsForMainPage

        public List<DiscussionForum> getForumsForMainPage()
        Specified by:
        getForumsForMainPage in interface DiscussionForumManager
        Returns:
        Returns a list of forums specific to the current site and with the necessary information to be displayed on the main forums page (the page first displayed when the forums tool is loaded). This information includes the forums' topics, the forums' attachments, and the topics' attachments.

      • getMessageCountsForMainPage

        public List<Object[]> getMessageCountsForMainPage(Collection<Long> topicIds)
        Specified by:
        getMessageCountsForMainPage in interface DiscussionForumManager
        Parameters:
        topicIds - The list of topic ids for which we want to gather the message counts.
        Returns:
        A list of arrays where each array will contain exactly two values. Index 0, a Long, will be the topicId and index 1, an Integer, will be the total number of messages under that topic (excluding any messages flagged as DRAFT or DELETED).

      • getReadMessageCountsForMainPage

        public List<Object[]> getReadMessageCountsForMainPage(Collection<Long> topicIds)
        Specified by:
        getReadMessageCountsForMainPage in interface DiscussionForumManager
        Parameters:
        topicIds - The list of topic ids for which we want to gather the message counts.
        Returns:
        A list of arrays where each array will contain exactly two values. Index 0, a Long, will be the topicId and index 1, an Integer, will be the total number of messages under that topic that the current user has read (excluding any messages flagged as DRAFT or DELETED).

      • getUsersAllowedForTopic

        public Set<String> getUsersAllowedForTopic(Long topicId,
                                  boolean checkReadPermission,
                                  boolean checkModeratePermission)
        Specified by:
        getUsersAllowedForTopic in interface DiscussionForumManager
        checkReadPermission - - user must have read permission for topic
        checkModeratePermission - - user must have moderate permission for topic
        Returns:
        a set of userIds for the site members who have "read" and/or "moderate" permission for the given topic. Uses the role and group permission settings for the topic to determine permission
